name: OCKHeaderView
desc: A view with a title and detail label.

items.name: init(configurationHandler: (inout OCKHeaderView.Configuration) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a header view with a configuration block.

items.name: struct OCKHeaderView.Configuration
items.desc: A configuration object that determines what the header view shows.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that vertically arranges its children views.

items.name: let iconImageView: UIImageView?
items.desc: The image on the leading end of the text in the view.

items.name: let titleLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A multi-line title label above the detail label in the header view.

items.name: let detailLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A multi-line detail label below the title label in the header view.

items.name: let detailDisclosureImage: UIImageView?
items.desc: The image on the trailing end of the view.
